sourcesContent: // @flow import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Circle, CircleMarker, Map, Marker, Polygon, Popup, Rectangle, TileLayer, Tooltip, } from 'react-leaflet' const center = [51.505, -0.09] const multiPolygon = [ [[51.51, -0.12], [51.51, -0.13], [51.53, -0.13]], [[51.51, -0.05], [51.51, -0.07], [51.53, -0.07]], ] const rectangle = [[51.49, -0.08], [51.5, -0.06]] export default class TooltipExample extends Component<{}, { clicked: number }> { state = { clicked: 0, } onClickCircle = () => { this.setState({ clicked: this.state.clicked + 1 }) } render() { const clickedText = this.state.clicked === 0 ? 'Click this Circle to change the Tooltip text' : `Circle click: ${this.state.clicked}` return ( {clickedText} Tooltip for CircleMarker Popup for Marker Tooltip for Marker sticky Tooltip for Polygon permanent Tooltip for Rectangle ) } }
